Class ProductDetailFacade

java.lang.Object
com.fulda.webshop.facade.ProductDetailFacade
@Service public class ProductDetailFacade extends Object
ProductDetailFacade provides methods to retrieve and manipulate detailed information about products. It interacts with ProductService and InventoryService to fetch data and perform operations.

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products available in the webshop.
      Returns:
      a list of all products

    • getProductDetailById

      public ProductDetailDTO getProductDetailById(Long id)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to retrieve details for
      Returns:
      a ProductDetailDTO containing detailed information about the specified product
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no product is found for the specified ID

      Returns:
      a list of products that match the specified name

      Parameters:
      name - name of products to filter
      pageable - pagination information including page number and size
      Returns:
      a Page containing matching products for requested page and size
